Package cairns.david.engine

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    The Animation class manages a series of images (frames) and the amount of time to display each frame.
    GameCore  
    GameCoreFS
    Simple abstract class used for testing.
    ScreenManager
    The ScreenManager class manages initializing and displaying full screen graphics modes.
    Sound  
    Sprite
    This class provides the functionality for a moving animated image or Sprite.
    Tile
    A Tile in the TileMap.
    TileMap
    TileMap enables you to load a character based tile map from a text file.
    Velocity
    The Velocity class provides the ability to manipulate and specify a Velocity as a speed and direction.
